bukavu/384246newsML_, the bigg.sentence_str: A senior Zaire defence official said Goma, the biggest city in rebel hands, was next on the hit list.

israel/462179newsML_, we.sentence_str: "_ In light of the situation, we estimate that as long as Arafat does not cause the terrorist organisations to understand that there is no green light to commit attacks, we are expecting more attacks, _" he said.

israel/462183newsML_Bar-Illan'.sentence_str: Palestinians, shrugging off Bar-Illan's threat, said negotiations were already at a deadlock anyway and blamed the lack of security on Netanyahu's groundbreaking last week for the Jewish settlement at Jabal Abu Ghneim, or Har Homa.

israel/462185newsML_Bar-Illan'.sentence_str: Palestinians, shrugging off Bar-Illan's comments, said talks were already at a deadlock and blamed the lack of security on Netanyahu's groundbreaking last week for the Jewish settlement on a hilltop that Palestinians call Jabal Abu Ghneim.

israel/462185newsML_, rubber b.sentence_str: Israeli soldiers fired live ammunition, rubber bullets and teargas at hundreds of Arab protesters who threw petrol bombs and rocks.

israel/462214newsML_, trade.sentence_str: "_ All the crossing points with Israel are closed to transportation, trade and the movement of people, _"Hisham Disouqi, Palestinian Authority coordinator of security at checkpoints with Israel, told Reuters.

peru/413400newsML_more than.mention_text: more than 3,000 people behind bars for "_ terrorism. _"
peru/413400newsML_more than.sentence_str: Peru has more than 3,000 people behind bars for "_ terrorism. _"The government admits that about 300 may be innocent and is examining their cases, but human rights groups say the number wrongly jailed could be as high as 1,000.

Mission of Observers in Tajikistan (UNMOT), told Reuters the government had promised to send several helicopters to neighbouring Afghanistan to pick up about 40 colleagues of the rebels and bring them safely to the hostage-takers' base.

tajikistan/375068newsML_, he.sentence_str: But their release was delayed as the two sides could not agree on a procedure for the hostages-for-rebels swap, he said.

tajikistan/375068newsML_, Tass.sentence_str: In Moscow, Russian Prime Minister Viktor Chernomyrdin was informed of the situation on Thursday evening while chairing a cabinet meeting, Tass said.
